generated_body: The article titled "Japan Wants You To Stop Buying All Its Skyline GT-Rs" is likely to discuss the growing concerns in Japan regarding the international demand for the iconic Skyline GT-R sports car. Readers may expect insights into how this demand is impacting the availability of these vehicles domestically, as well as the cultural significance of the car within Japan. The piece could also explore the reasons behind the Japanese government's or manufacturers' desire to discourage foreign purchases, possibly addressing issues related to nostalgia, preservation of automotive heritage, or market sustainability.
